section.para: %LJ::HELPURLS is a hash that defines URLs to supplemental documentation regarding a specific feature or widget in the LiveJournal interface. The following list describes the suggested content of each URL.

listitem.simpara: Explains the different security settings available for posts
Explains how the Don't automatically format option works
Explains the differing amount of userpics available to each capability class
Explains what the IP Logging feature is, and what it is useful for
Explains why certain S2 settings might not be available to certain capability classes
Explains why a userpic may be inactive for, and how to make the userpic active again
Explains what the text messaging feature is and how it works
